meta.title: SYNELL: World-class Software Development, Project Management Office, Design, Business Analysis & Engineering
meta.description: Since 2007, we've helped businesses smoothly implement advanced technologies, understand the industry, and determine maximum productivity. Our approach is to work closely with the client through each stage of project, carefully explaining all aspects to create stress-free innovation.

phone.desc: Toll-free from the US and Canada

main.title: Since 2007, we have been designing, developing, and implementing products that change the world.
main.text: No missed deadlines, a controlled budget, and detailed progress reports from start to finish.

dev.dev__fluid_text: Effective development based on sound methodology
dev.dev__title: Turnkey products that represent all of your business and market realities
dev.help__text_margin: Due to in-depth analytics and rigorous testing
dev.dev__title2: Track progress at each stage of the project.
dev.dev__sub: The main stages of project implementation:

list.dev__text:
We conduct key interviews project persons on Skype or in the office. Define goals and criteria project success.

We agree on the stages of work and rules communication between all project stakeholders

Our team selects technologies that are best suited for the consumer and the company's business processes. We identify any risks, perform Story Mapping, and define product requirements. The result is a clear plan and a strong team in place for product implementation.
Through documentation and a product knowledge base, we create the infrastructure. Next, we provide training. Finally, we hand over the finished product.

We'll install a dashboard and set the fixation of key product indicators. We then supervise how the product performs in actual business and make changes as necessary. The result? A product that fulfills the client's set goals and is as convenient as possible.
We set up monitoring. We form a team for technical support. We correct errors in due time. We are developing new features. The result is uninterrupted product operation.

price.title: Exact Pricing in Advance
price.text: We present a detailed estimate at each stage of the project.

services.steps__title: Our experienced team can handle any problem big or small

slider__list.steps__text: From implementation to inception, we handle every step - on time and on budget
slider__list.steps__title: A team of specialized experts organizes all project work:
steps__list: Analysis, design, and selection of implementers
Change and Risk Management
Strict budget, timing, and quality control
Organized, clear work and communication with project clients
Daily project monitoring and results management
Get a consultation

slider__list.steps__text: We'll help turn a problem into an opportunity for growth and profit.
steps__list: Identification and Development of Relationship
Identification of Business Problem and Analysis of Opportunities
Determining requirements for product development, realization, implementation, operation, and disposal
Change Management and Monitoring
efficiency assessment of implemented solution
Post-implementation assessment to ensure business goals are met
Find solutions to adapt organization to new technology

slider__list.steps__text: We'll help brainstorm, design, create, and implement the next generation's technology - for your leaders of today and tomorrow.
slider__list.steps__helpmargin: Combining industry and technical expertise, and taking into account business needs, market demand, and future development strategy, we create digital solutions from scratch or refresh an existing product in any stage of its lifecycle.

slider__list.steps__text: We'll modernize your product based on your individual business processes and development strategies. We'll update functionality and enhance the capacity of the IT solution.
steps__list: We technically examine and test the system.
We analyze the system to ensure its conformity with business processes and business development strategy
We check the convenience for the target audience
We create a gradual system modernization plan
We'll proceed with development and gradual implementation of the modernized system
Get Consultation

slider__list.steps__text: We'll fully update or finish your product to help you meet deadlines
steps__list: We examine the system and all existing data code and repositories
We perform system audit and testing
We create a defect correction plan
We eliminate the defects and test the product
We issue the first release and together, create a plan to develop the product
Get Consultation

work.work__title: No need to waste company time and resources. We will choose the most effective tools for the job
work__list: Convenient and Modern Interfaces
Quality Control and Testing
dots__slider: We Identify, Analyze, Check and Document all Functional and Non-Functional Requirements, Data Flows and User Interface Components. We create Prototypes. We describe Product Vision and Development Strategy.
Product development through Holistic Comprehension of needs and emotions of people. Simplifying Complexity by allowing businesses to develop more Valuable Relationships between you and your Users.
We help to Determine Product Scope Without Excessive Development. We form Product Development Stages. And we create Product Itself with Minimal but Sufficient Functions for the First Users.

Development of Products and Applications that Simplify, Automate and Optimize Business Processes in the company which leads to Increased Efficiency, Costs Reduction and Human Factor Reduction in the company.
We organize Collaboration of all your Software Products through Integration at the Server Level, Sata, Services and API. Usually to increase Efficiency of Company and Transparency of Managers.
Quality Control at every stage of product creation. Manual and Automatic Testing for Errors in code, for Convenience of Working with product, for Safety from High Loads and Hacking.
After Implementation of Product, we organize Technical Support and Ensure Product Smooth Operation. Any errors are fixed for free. If necessary, Further Development of Product is Possible.
We Monitor Key Indicators of product on Real Users, and Check how Product Fulfills its Purpose.

portfolio.portfolio__title: Over 150 projects from various industries around the world.

portfolio__cell.portfolio__text: Cost Reduction through Operating Performance Increase and Automation, Innovations and Business Process Transformation.
Online- and Mobile Insurance, Accounting for Insurance Contracts, Analytics and Big Data, b2b-systems, Personalised Service and etc.
New Solutions and Platforms for both developing and already well-established IT companies around the world.

Customization of ERP Software, industry-specific Analytical Applications and Control Panels Development, Budgeting Systems Construction and Logistics Support, Implementation of Solutions for Project and Investment Management.
Omnichannel Customer Service, Digital Strategies Development , Analytics and Marketing Platforms Implementation.
Development of platforms and mobile applications for online learning, Analytical Applications and Control Panels, Solutions for Analytics and Marketing.
Big Data, Data Science, Digital Interaction and Predictive Analytics.
Media Strategies Development, Implementation of Advanced Technologies for organization of TV Everywhere, Audience Analysis and Content Distribution through Digital Channels.
Development and Interaction with Blockchain Ecosystems, Cryptocurrency Services, Mobile Applications, Blockchain-based Business Solutions.
Omnichannel Customer Service Solutions, Online and Mobile Sales, Digital Marketing and Loyalty Management.
We help companies Implement Innovations and move forward faster than their competitors.
We create Optimal Solutions for many Business Problems, helping companies Reduce Costs, Increase Profit and Operational Efficiency, Improve Interaction Quality with Customers.

support.support__title: We help implement the product, train employees, and achieve desired results.
support.p_gray: We provide integrated support post-development and implementation.
support.support__inner: Detailed, technical documentation of the system
support.support__inner2: Online employee training and video recordings
support.support__inner4: Assurance that data is safe, secure, and resist to hacker attacks

overview.overview__title: We'll install a dashboard and track on real users
overview.help__text: We'll install a dashboard and real-time user tracker for product indicators at 3, 6, and 12 months. We'll check to make sure the product fulfills its purpose and make changes as necessary

guarantees.guarantees__title: 100% guarantee for on-time delivery and project free of freeze
guarantees.info__content: If you find a bug in the product, we will immediately fix it.
list: you are not 100% satisfied with your product, we guarantee a full refund
We provide a detailed development plan - so you know in advance what will happen and for how long
You will receive weekly progress reports and the opportunity to address any comments or concerns that may arise along the way

contacts.contacts__work: Design and development of international software products.

modal.polit:
Consent to processing of personal data

By providing their personal data User agrees to processing, holding and usage of their personal data by operation of Federal Law № 152 «Personal Data Usage» 2006, July, 27th, for the following purposes:

  1. Implementation of client support
  2. Mailout of marketing events information
  3. Performance of an audit and other kind of research for the purpose of provided services' refinement

By personal data we mean any kind of personal information that helps establish identity of User/Customer, namely:

  1. Surname, Name, Patronymic Name
  2. Date of Birth
  3. Telephone Number
  4. E-mail Address
  5. Post Address

Users' personal data are entirely stored on the electronic media and processed with the use of automated systems, except for the situations when manual processing of personal data is needed due to the requirements of legislation. The company is obliged not to pass received personal data to a third party, except for the following cases:

  1. Appropriate Russian governmental authorities' inquiries on the ground of and in accordance with the Constitution of the Russian Federation.
  2. Strategic partners that work with the Company, grant their products and services and help the Company to deliver products and services to the customers. We pass the minimum dose of personal data to the third party, if the data are necessary for service delivery of implementation of a transaction.

The company reserves the right to amend in the existing rules on a unilateral basis, upon condition, that the changes don't contradict with the present Russian Law. The change in present rules comes into effect post-publication on the web-site.
